name: Bonk
description: The first Solana dog coin for the people, originally airdropped to the Solana community.
funFact: Bonk revived the Solana ecosystem in late 2022 when sentiment was at an all-time low.

name: Dogwifhat
description: A meme coin featuring a Shiba Inu wearing a pink knitted hat.
funFact: The original meme was sold as an NFT for thousands of dollars.

name: Jupiter
description: The largest DEX aggregator on Solana, routing trades across multiple liquidity sources.
funFact: Jupiter processes billions in volume and is the go-to swap interface for most Solana users.

name: Pyth Network
description: A decentralized oracle network providing real-time market data to DeFi protocols.
funFact: Pyth powers price feeds for major Solana DeFi protocols with sub-second updates.

name: Samoyedcoin
description: The official mascot of Solana, a friendly Samoyed dog representing the community.
funFact: SAMO was one of the earliest meme coins on Solana and helped build community spirit.

name: Cope
description: A meme coin about dealing with losses and moving forward in crypto.
funFact: COPE became popular during the 2021 bull run as traders needed to 'cope' with volatility.

name: Step Finance
description: A portfolio management dashboard for Solana DeFi positions.
funFact: Step Finance was one of the first comprehensive DeFi dashboards on Solana.

name: Raydium
description: An automated market maker (AMM) and liquidity provider on Solana.
funFact: Raydium was the first major AMM on Solana and remains a core DeFi protocol.

name: Orca
description: A user-friendly DEX on Solana known for its clean interface and whale-friendly pools.
funFact: Orca's mascot is a friendly whale, and they focus on making DeFi accessible to everyone.

name: Marinade
description: A liquid staking protocol that lets you stake SOL and earn rewards while maintaining liquidity.
funFact: Marinade was the first liquid staking solution on Solana, unlocking staked SOL for DeFi.
